meta_description_localized.en: Hop to It on Easter Weekend in NYC with These Fun Outings

post_content_localized.en:
Hop to It on Easter Weekend in NYC with These Fun Outings

What could be finer than celebrating spring in New York City? There are a number of festive events taking place where you can make lasting memories. Enjoy our round up of Easter weekend events in NYC.

Easter Parade in New York City

The annual Easter Parade and Easter Bonnet Festival is where people put on their fanciest clothes, don Easter bonnets, and march down 5th Avenue. You can either join the march or watch the pageantry. The parade will start at 10 a.m.

Easter Celebration at CMOM

The Children’s Museum of Manhattan is throwing an Easter celebration complete with a museum-wide Easter egg scavenger hunt. Kids who find them all get a prize.

Easter Brunch in Manhattan

Brunch in the city is an event worth celebrating any season but for Easter restaurants often have some of their finest offerings. Timeout New York has a great round up of suggestions that incorporate every style of dining.

Easter Egg Hunts

A classic Easter egg hunt is the perfect way to enjoy the holiday with the kids. Several huts take places throughout the city. In particular, NYSoM’s Easter Eggstravaganza is a free event with an egg hunt, egg painting, arts and crafts, and pictures with the Easter Bunny.

Join in the springtime fun, whether you’re grabbing brunch or checking out the Easter parade in New York City. Stay with us at The Manhattan Club to make it a truly great Easter weekend.
